definition: owl (order Strigiformes)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
variant of 屌[diao3]/penis
(bird species of China) barn owl (Tyto alba)
(bird species of China) Sichuan wood owl (Strix davidi)
(bird species of China) spot-bellied eagle-owl (Bubo nipalensis)
(bird species of China) oriental bay owl (Phodilus badius)
(bird species of China) spotted owlet (Athene brama)
(bird species of China) Blakiston's fish owl (Bubo blakistoni)
(bird species of China) Himalayan owl (Strix nivicolum)
(bird species of China) great grey owl (Strix nebulosa)
(bird species of China) dusky eagle-owl (Bubo coromandus)
(bird species of China) northern hawk-owl (Surnia ulula)
(bird species of China) Ryukyu scops owl (Otus elegans)
(bird species of China) short-eared owl (Asio flammeus)
(bird species of China) oriental scops owl (Otus sunia)
(bird species of China) little owl (Athene noctua)
(bird species of China) pallid scops owl (Otus brucei)

sentences.english: The Air Force calls the SIDM Harfang, or Snow Owl.
The European eagle owl is close to the snowy owl.
sentences.chinese: 這隻歐洲鷹鴞正在接近那隻雪鴞。

sentences.english: The European eagle owl is close to the snowy owl.
sentences.chinese: 這隻歐洲鷹鴞正在接近那隻雪鴞。

sentences.english: Living in Lesser Khingan Mountains, Accipiter gentiles and Strix nebulosa share the same habit of reusing their old nests.
sentences.chinese: 在小興安嶺繁殖的蒼鷹和烏林鴞都有利用舊巢的習慣。

sentences.english: This chick is the first Kakapo hatched in 2014.
sentences.chinese: 這是2014年孵化的第一隻鴞鸚鵡。

sentences.english: A common kestrel chases a barn owl, which is carrying a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 一隻普通的紅隼追逐着一隻刁着老鼠的倉鴞。

sentences.english: The barn owl locates the direction of a sound in two ways.
sentences.chinese: 倉鴞用兩種方式鎖定聲音的方向。

sentences.english: It is a small species of owl with yellow eyes and ear tufts.
sentences.chinese: 普通角鴞是一種小型鴞類，眼睛爲黃色，具簇狀耳羽。

sentences.english: It is a small species of owl with yellow eyes and ear tufts.
sentences.chinese: 普通角鴞是一種小型鴞類，眼睛爲黃色，具簇狀耳羽。

sentences.english: The great majority of barn owls are reared in captivity .
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數倉鴞都是圈養的。

sentences.english: But the eagle owl is a large bird, and thespeed and ratios are effected by the size of bird.
sentences.chinese: 但是雕鴞是一種大鳥，鳥的大小會影響到速度和比值。

sentences.english: The team estimates that the kakapo has 667 functional olfactory receptor genes.
sentences.chinese: 據估計鴞鵡有667個起作用的嗅覺感受器。

definition: variant of 駁|驳[bo2]
long-tailed marmot
variant of 狸[li2]
bird of prey
scops owl
(bound form, used in the names of various kinds of bird, esp. robins and redstarts)
sparrow hawk/swift
variant of 鷈|䴘[ti1]
see 鷫鸘|鹔鹴[su4 shuang1]
variant of 鷿|䴙[pi4]
(bird species of China) western osprey (Pandion haliaetus)
(of a bird) to fly swiftly/to swoop
pheasant/turkey/old variant of 鷁|鹢[yi4]
the Pycnonotidae or bulbul family of birds
see 鶖鷺|鹙鹭[qiu1 lu4]
flying squirrel
